Text.Page:
You look like a hardy sort. Want a job on the side?

Relics from the giant civilization that once stood here litter the desert. Scholars will drop a pretty coin on the more complete pieces. I'll get the buyers if you get the goods, and we'll split the take.

Well, you made it back out of the desert. Did you find anything?

Awfully small for giant relics, but who else would have left them? Anyway, the buyer paid half in advance, so here's yours. Thanks!
You want gold, I want relics. What part of this is confusing you?
